title: Woodlands Dark and Days Bewitched: A History of Folk Horror
plot: Woodlands Dark and Days Bewitched: A History of Folk Horror: Directed by Kier-La Janisse. With Linda Hayden, Ian Ogilvy, Kevin Kölsch, Sean Hogan. A thorough overview and dissection of the subgenre of 'folk horror, ' with contributions from many of the major creators and clips from cinema all over the world.
